_header: Hail Maiden of Maidens through word conceiving
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: Hymn based on the Angelic Salutation — seventeen long quatrains

BodDou126.First Lines:
Hayle mayden of maydyns thorgth worde consaywyngHayle mayden &
                    moder with þi mylke cryst Ihesu norescheng…
BodDou126.Last Lines:
…Amen to þe with all here myȝth say euery
                    creatureAmen worchep euer be to þe qwyle any þynge schall
                    dure
BodDou126.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “Ave Maria.” 
             Anglia
         27 (1904): 320-30: 320-3.
Saupe,  Karen,
                        ed.  
             Middle English Marian
                    Lyrics.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 1998: 55-8; 184-6.
